publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-6605 Roseanna Cunningham: Crofting Reform (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Crofting Reform (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*
S3M-6605 Roseanna Cunningham: Crofting Reform (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Crofting Reform (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Richard Lochhead
